item.title: Open Source Multi Search Engines Tools
item.description:
Maybe you'd also like to visit this page for more up-to-date info List / Comparison / Alternatives of open source web searching (multi-engines) tools Welcome PR if you want to add or correct any infomation Browser Extensions / Addons Browser addon Web app Build-in engines Categorize engines Search history reuse & manage HTTP POST Websites showing results by Ajax Provide input box User-custom engines Use browser-installed engines Context Menu Search Omnibox Drag to search In-web float panel Use many engines at once Sync settings by browser Firefox's searchbar - - <10 ‚ùå üü¢ ?
